data.text: @zyblonius What’s getting me is the word “post-pandemic.” We are still very much in a pandemic, our governments just decided to stop doing anything about it.

@SarahSawler People are so goddamned stupid I am losing my absolute mind.  Ready to snap every time I see it referred to as a reopening plan.  It's not a plan!  It's not a plan at all!  Just because it's happening in stages?  Those stages aren't based on anything relevant!

@SarahSawler yes. these were protections. they are literally stripping away the only thing we had protecting us. not looking forward to the stats on how many chronically ill and disabled people will die over the next xx months.
